Reviews.Title: Got what I asked for
Reviews.Author: Webduo "HD Fanatic"
Reviews.Content: This worked out perfect for me as I didn't want to invest in a new laptop as this was a secondary PC to my iMac, so it worked out perfect as the price was low and so far the laptop has worked flawlessly.  I'd buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: SELLER THREATENS AND REFUSES TO PROVIDE O.S. SYSTEM ADVERTIZSED
Reviews.Author: George Mooney
Reviews.Content: SELLER PROVIDED SYSTEM WITH VISTA O.S. SYSTEM LOADED ONTO IT.  I DID NOT IMMEDIATELY NOTICE UNTIL I HAD CHANCE TO REALLY LOOK AT MACHINE.  ON IT IS  NOT WINDOWS 7 PREMIUM AS SPECIFIED. SELLER APPEARS TO BE NOW THREATENING ME IN SOME WAY BECAUSE OF AVERAGE RATING THAT WAS PREVIOUSLY POSTED.  IN MY MIND THAT WAS GENEROUS SEEING THE SEVERAL WEEKS THAT PASSED SINCE ANY REPLY TO MY ADMITTEDLY  LATE FEEDBACK TO AND LACK OF REPLY FROM SELLER.  FRANKLY, ONE OF MY HIPS WAS PAINFULLY DETERIORATING WHEN I RECEIVED THE MACHINE. REALLY FOLKS YOU GO FROM A CANE TO A WALKER VERY QUICKLY... THIS RESULTED IN A TRIP TO THE HOSPITAL TO HAVE A TOTAL HIP REPLACEMENT.  I AM CURRENTLY IN WHAT IS CALLED A SUB-ACUTE NURSING HOME CARE REHABBING AND FACING A MUCH MORE SERIOUS SURGERY. I HAVE  LITTLE PATIENCE FOR A VENDOR WHO IS UNWILLING TO LIVE UP TO THEIR WORD. THEY WILL NOTE THE RETURN DATE AND THAT RULES ARE RULES BUT NEVER WHAT THEY PR0VIDED OR THEIR LACKLUSTER REPLY.  BRINGING THE MACHINE INTO A WINDOWS 7 PREMIUM ENVIRONMENT WILL COST A MINIMUM OF $109.OO.  AND YES, I DID RELATE SAME TO SELLER.

Reviews.Title: Never purchase anything from BTG
Reviews.Author: jane owens
Reviews.Content: The computer crashed 2 days after I received it. I notified the company immediately. They took my name and number but never called back for IT support. The warranty was for 14 days after the date of purchase but it took 2 wks to get here. I will never purchase anything from  Blair Technology Group again. I will also encourage friends and family to do the same. I am now stuck with a computer that does not work and that I need to replace.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Jim WIndle
Reviews.Content: Computer's screen goes blue and you have to reboot.  In a hour I have this happen 2-3 times.  Don't buy spend you money else where.

Reviews.Title: was worried about used.... But NO WORRIES!
Reviews.Author: misplaced in Utah "baker lady"
Reviews.Content: Great pc for home office. Like windows7 , the office program is a little quirky, but does adapt well to ms program. Great buy for the money, prompt delivery as well!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: keyman
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted, accidently erased adobe reader, e-mailed seller and they were excellent in solving problem! Solid laptop for what it cost!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished HP laptop
Reviews.Author: maureen
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for my husband to use in Florida. He has another HP at home and is quite used to the Windows 7, so he likes it. I bought the refurbished one as I didn't want to spend too much money as he only does email and internet while here for the winter. So far, it is working well with our WiFi and wireless printer. Very easy to set up and coordinate with those items. He is very happy to have his own laptop.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Flora B Frain
Reviews.Content: I received the laptop in good time however when i opened the box and removed the laptop to check it out I noticed the top was not closed completely.  I tried several times to close the top but it would not stay closed.  So I returned the laptop for a full refund.  The laptop was nice it was not dented or abused but The top would not stay shut was my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: great computer
Reviews.Author: jon leonard
Reviews.Content: it actually looks different than the picture on amazon, but over all it is fast and pretty good. thank you

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Debbie Humphries
Reviews.Content: Over the years I have owned almost every brand of laptop including a Mac.  I have found that HP has the most reliable products on the market.  When I powered the computer on everything worked and setup was very easy. The only Con I have about this computer is it is rather heavy.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Sheila Ligon
Reviews.Content: I am happy with my selection.  Although, it is quite more complicated than I am used to, I am learning more about it.  It is very heavy, too.  But I like all the options, because I work out of town.  It is refurbished, and it has not broken down yet!

Reviews.Title: Better Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: R. Stevens
Reviews.Content: Received my order within four days and well packaged for an electronic item.  I appreciate this type of service from a vendor.  My refurbished laptop came with an actual OS Windows 7 Home CD, necessary for rebooting if required.  Took me 45 minutes to establish setup, connect to my wi-fi and download free updates to both the antivirus and Windows systems.  Additionally, the laptop came with 3 gigs of RAM verses 2 and this HP really moves fast with Windows 7 OS.  This was purchased for my 6th Grader so she could do homework, connect to a home wireless printer, and watch DVDs.  (Note, even with a parental control software program loaded to the laptop it still runs quick.)  Potential drawbacks would be the small hard drive (160 gigs) and the lack of a built in webcam, both of which can be mitigated with external devices.  For less than $200 it was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Decision
Reviews.Author: RidgeviewSales
Reviews.Content: Not wanting to go to the new Microsoft computer program, I needed a computer for a recent road trip trade show, I couldn't believe that if I bought a NEW computer (laptop) I would have to go with the new software.  Even the Best Buy salespeople said no one likes the new Microsoft program software - so I set out looking at buying a "used" computer, with Windows Seven.  I was pleasantly surprised by the quality and condition of this purchase.  The unit I got was functional and in great shape.  I would recommend this company for their ability to refurbish and deliver an excellent value product.  This was just what I needed.  It's a shame that I had to look to a "used" computer because Microsoft had to come out with something that nobody likes.

Reviews.Title: A useful tool at a great price
Reviews.Author: reader
Reviews.Content: The refurbished HP Elitebook I bought its great!  It fits perfectly with my needs.  I use it mainly to stream radio shows and write emails.  I have a desktop which is my primary computer.  I recommend the Elite as a good, serviceable and reliable second computer which can be purchased at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Please send return instructions
Reviews.Author: John P Downey
Reviews.Content: Incorrect item sent.Received8530p .It took 3 days to get it charged after I opened the pkg. after I disconnected it from AC power ittold me it was on low power so I shut it down.Reconnected to AC but it will not come on John  Downey

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, Great battery, A+ Shipping
Reviews.Author: jody b
Reviews.Content: Great laptop, came better then expected. Windows 7 was loaded but not setup, which is great. A couple bloatware items on the desktop, but easily removed those programs.Battery life is A+, we got almost 3 Hours off the battery, that is actually pretty good, considering this was a refurb.Came with 2gb of ram and 150gb HDD as advertised.Screen is nice and easy on the eyes, no blemishes, no dead pixels.Shell is great and gives the laptop a nice sturdy feel.Overall this laptop was great, perfect for my girlfriend to browse the web, do her homework, and its pretty snappy for Office. She has a beastly desktop for other things. I will be upgrading to 4 or 8gb of ram, I will probably run with 4 because the OS is 32-bit, and I would have to get another copy of Windows 7 if i went with 8 to utlize the ram completely, as with 4, the dedicated onboard GPU will use the 512mb of ram the OS does not see.Oh, and the packaging was VERY unique, it was laid flat in a special box, and there was some very tight clear wrap with very sticky edges used to hold it down to the cardboard, and then the cardboard around the laptop was folded up and it made a box around the laptop - pretty awesome to keep it from bouncing around and keep it safe.A+ seller

Reviews.Title: Good investment
Reviews.Author: William R. Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: This was everything I wanted in a lap top.  Great investment for the price  Only catch is the battery rated for only 2 hours before recharge..

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Lady Lighthouse
Reviews.Content: It's great! Came on time, worked as expected, nice and fast. And nice and light (but still solid), which I didn't expect, but love! Everything's good. :)

Reviews.Title: Love HP
Reviews.Author: cyndylu "Cyndy Walker"
Reviews.Content: I really love this computer so far. Simple to use and easy to understand. Had to get a new one when Microsoft quit supporting XP as my  old one had that. Got this HP with Windows 7  and am really glad I made this choice. It's the right size for me, and light weight, easy to open and start. I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: renegade
Reviews.Content: Seems to be in good working condition. It is a gift to my son and has not been given to him yet.

Reviews.Title: The were some bumps along the way, but...
Reviews.Author: Bill in CT
Reviews.Content: I ordered this PC in January. It arrived and it was (1) not what I ordered and (2) was in poor condition. The RAM was wrong, the keyboard was in bad condition and the battery would not charge. Why the 5 star rating then? Because I contacted the company, US Micro and they sent me the missing RAM, a replacement battery and a replacement keyboard immediately. The computer then failed completely. Not sure why, but basically it was just a black screen with a cursor. Contacted them again. They sent the prepaid return label via email and shipped out the replacement very quickly. This was a lot of hassle I know. I am also aware that I bought a refurbished unit and things do go wrong. The customer service kept in contact the entire time and they made things right, which was far more than I expected at this price. I will use them again if I need another PC.

Reviews.Title: My Friend Loves It
Reviews.Author: George W. Burgoon
Reviews.Content: An elderly friend was looking for her first computer so she could have e-mail and learn how to research on the Internet.  She loves it and has mastered the two tasks just mentioned.  For the price it was well worth it.

Reviews.Title: working just right
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Had an old script that would only work on a 32b XP OS and it is working just great.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Catherine Tanner
Reviews.Content: Love this computer!! Bought it for my grandkids and its working very well!!!  My granddaughters use it everyday!!!  Thank You!!!

Reviews.Title: Lar Top
Reviews.Author: Harold Lillie
Reviews.Content: Never sent the Disc with the Laptop Once you did send the disk .found out the windows needs to be activated and there is no productkey for it.So keeps asking to actvate.does not work unless it is pluged indoes not charge battery is junk.NOT worth the money or the timer.I am a truck driverand use a laptop alot and this one is junker then my old wore out one.

Reviews.Title: met expectation
Reviews.Author: william edmonds
Reviews.Content: it met my expectation, seeing that it was used,had a  little trouble with finding the product key, but it loaded  ok  has been fine every since

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - INTEL Core 2 Duo 2400 MHz || Memory Installed - 2048mb DDR2 > Upgradeable to 8192MB
Hard Drive - 120Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD-RW || Screen Size - 14.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABG WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - HP Elitebook 6930p with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP Elitebook 6930p INTEL Core 2 Duo 2400 MHz 120Gig Serial ATA HDD 2048mb DDR2 DVD-RW Wireless WI-FI 14.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
